Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Hubbard
ShortDescription: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Grand, Union and Milwaukee due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Grand, Union and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Hubbard

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute near Lawrence/Sheridan
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses rerouted EB: Wilson, and Marine Drive; WB: Lawrence, Sheridan, and Wilson due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Sheridan.

Eastbound buses will operate via Wilson, and Marine Drive.

Westbound buses will operate via Lawrence, Sheridan, and Wilson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Trains bypassing 79th Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 79th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 79th due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available between 69th and 87th to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Cicero due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttle buses will be available between LaSalle and Forest Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
